displayName.text: Law Office Of Katherine E. Smith

formattedAddress: 233 Broadway Suite 900, Suite 900, New York, NY 10279, USA
adrFormatAddress: 233 Broadway Suite 900, Suite 900, New York, NY 10279, USA

originalText.text: Katherine and her office were very understanding and compassionate for my complicated case. She took a lot of time to explain to me the litigation process and timeline, and ultimately my case was resolved quickly. I appreciate everyones work and effort into my case. I would definitely recommend her services if you are looking for an attorney that cares and truly wants the best outcome for you.

text.text: Katherine and her office were very understanding and compassionate for my complicated case. I would definitely recommend her services if you are looking for an attorney that cares and truly wants the best outcome for you.

originalText.text: Katie helped my husband who was falsely arrested & held. She was was meticulous and got the job done! Very professional, very detail oriented and God forbid if another situation arises, we’ll definitely be seeking her counsel again!

text.text: Katie helped my husband who was falsely arrested & held. She was was meticulous and got the job done! Very professional, very detail oriented and God forbid if another situation arises, we’ll definitely be seeking her counsel again!

originalText.text: I am so glad that I found Katherine Smith, Esq. online just by doing the search in Google.  It turned out that she is the best lawyer whom I have ever worked with.   She is understanding and very supportive.   She would tell you honestly how your case is.   Her advice is always at the client's best interest.

text.text: I am so glad that I found Katherine Smith, Esq. online just by doing the search in Google.  It turned out that she is the best lawyer whom I have ever worked with.   She is understanding and very supportive.   She would tell you honestly how your case is.   Her advice is always at the client's best interest.

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience with Katherine Smith and her staff.  She helped me turn a bad situation around quickly and with the best possible outcome.  She is very savvy, confident, personable, respectful, and all around pleasure to work with.  I never felt rushed with my time with her and she made sure I understood everything that was going on and that I felt comfortable and confident in our approach.  I would definitely recommend her, even though I hope to never have to call on her services again, haha!

text.text: I had a wonderful experience with Katherine Smith and her staff.  She helped me turn a bad situation around quickly and with the best possible outcome.  She is very savvy, confident, personable, respectful, and all around pleasure to work with.  I never felt rushed with my time with her and she made sure I understood everything that was going on and that I felt comfortable and confident in our approach.  I would definitely recommend her, even though I hope to never have to call on her services again, haha!

originalText.text:
My experience with Ms. Katherine Smith was very pleasant and satisfying because she was very professional and hands on. She made me feel like my case was her #1 priority even tho I knew she was overloaded with dozens of other cases. I always felt Ms.Smith was always honest with me and kept me in the loop about everything that was happening. Even when things wasn't looking the best she stayed positive and help me stay positive as well. Ms.Smith is a great lawyer and confident I may add which from my experience she has a right to be. She's the genuine article as a great person and a professional to help you get what you deserve and she will get you what you deserve with no doubts. Thanks You Ms.Smith you helped change my life for the better!

Sincerely,
Branden Brown
